title: Problem with new client
body:
I can not buy the champions in the new client.
Can someone help me?

replies.body: Can't buy champs through the "collection" tab yet; need to go through the store.

I'm not sure what issue you're having specifically, but if you can go into a bit more detail I'd be happy to help.  For example, are you getting any error messages?  If so, what does it say?  Let me know!

if you cannot buy champions or use the shop in the new client then it must still optimization issues, dont know why Riot is trying to force players to get used to a client that has this many optimization issues as well as the fact that most of the community doesnt like the new client for how it was done in the first place.

my advice to your issue is to go back to the legacy client atleast you know there are any issues there that are immediate to fix
